City Council
============

Physical Address:

3800 University Boulevard

### Contact Us

1. 3800 University Boulevard
2. West University Place, TX 77005
3. Phone: [713.668.4441](tel:7136684441)
4. Emergency: 911
5. Hours of Operation:
6. Monday-Friday

   7:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m.
